rukus.text: 15|80|hijeuleu baegseongdeuldo yeeonjadeul eul bulsinhayeoss-euni
15|81|hananim-i geudeul-ege yejeung-eul bonaess-euna geudeul-eun geue gwanhayeo bul sinhamyeo
15|82|geu san-e jib-eul sewi hananim-uibeol-eul pihago anjeonhage sallyeogo ha yeoss-euna
15|83|haneul-ui cheonbeol-i achim jigjeon-e geudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeoss-euni
15|84|geudeul-i eod-eossdeon modeun geos-i geudeul-ege yuyongchi moshayeossdeola
15|85|hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui modeun geos-eul jinlilo changjoha yeossgo ttohan simpan-ui nal-i olgeos-ila geuleomeulo geudaeneun geudeul-ege neogeu leobgo gwandaehala
15|86|sillo geudaeui junim-eun changjoju isa asineun bun-isila
15|87|hananim-eun geudaeege jaju nang songhaneun ilgobjeolgwa widaehan kkulan-eul jueossnola

15|88|hananim-i ilbu bulsinjadeullohayeo hyanglag-eul gajdolog han geos-e geudaeneunnun-eul keuge tteuji malmyeo geudeul-ui bul sin-eulo seulpeohaji malgo midneunjadeul-eul-wihae geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
15|89|illeogalodoe sillo naega bunmyeong han gyeong-gojaila
15|90|bubun-eulo bunlihan baegseongdeul-egegyesihaessdeus-i geudaeege kkulan-eul gyesihaess-eudoe
15|91|kkulan-eul bubun-eulo bunlihan bul sinjadeul-i iss-eoss-eumeulo
15|92|geudae junim-ui ileum-eulo hana nim-eun geudeul moduege jilmunhasinila
15|93|geudeul-i haenghadeon modeun geos-e gwanhan geos-ila
15|94|geuleomeulo geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos-eul seon-eonhadoe bulsinjadeullobuteo meollihala
15|95|hananim-eun jolonghaneun jadeullobuteo geudaeleul bohoham-e chungmanham-ila
15|96|hananimkke daleun sin-eul biyuha neun ja geudeul-eun god alge doelila
15|97|geudeul-i geojishaneun geos-eulo geu daeui ma-eum-i geunsimdoem-eul algo issna ni
15|98|geuleona geudaeui junim-eul chanmi hago eopdeulyeo buboghaneun ja jung-e iss-eula
15|99|geudaeui junim-eul gyeongbaehala hwag silhan geunal-i geudaeege olila
